侐字的基本解释

侐
xù

侐字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xù］
［《廣韻》況逼切，入職，曉。］
［《廣韻》火季切，去至，曉。］
亦作“伵1”。
清静；沉寂。

侐字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　侐； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页102第04
【唐韻】况逼切【集韻】【韻會】忽域切，?兄入聲。寂也，靜也。【詩·魯頌】閟宮有侐。　又【集韻】火季切，音呬。義同。

侐字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
侐字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xù］
[The situation of "Guang Yun" is pressing, enter the post, Xiao. ]
["Guangyun" fire season cut, go to, Xiao. ]
Also known as "伵1".
Quiet; silent.
unmoving
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset] [Human Character Department] 　侐; Kangxi Strokes: 8; Page Number: Page 102 04
[Tang Yun] The situation is forced to cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Suddenly cut, brother enters the voice. Silence is also quiet. 【Poetry·Lu Song】There are things in the palace.　[Jiyun] Fire season cut, sound 呬. The same meaning.
